name: fullscreen Menu
author: hamza najih

sections.description:
Fullscreen Menu is a free plugin to create custom fullscreen menu quickly in your wordpress website (user-friendly, highly customizable, responsive)

Documentation & Demo : http://najih.net/fullscreen-menu-wordpress-plugin/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to Appearance > Menus and create a menu and assign it to ‘fullscreen Menu Plugin’
  4. go to ‘fullscreen Menu Plugin’ option to customize it

short_description: Fullscreen Menu is a free plugin to create custom fullscreen menu quickly in your wordpress website (user-friendly, highly customizable, responsive)
